Sports Day Announcements

University Of Limpopo

CELEBRATING SPORTS DAY

Take part in soccer tournament to win great prizes! The SRC encourages students to register and represent their faculties.

University Of Limpopo

Date is the 17th of October 2023 At the Oscar Mpetha Stadium. Tournament will start at 9H00 in the morning

Prizes includes Soccer kits, Trophies, Medals and many more. Enlist at your respective schools. GOOD LUCK!!!
